lead_paragraph: Two of three court judges said that the clashes could amount to crimes against humanity. The judges’ decision will now allow the prosecution to bring a case.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject

snippet: Two of three court judges said that the clashes could amount to crimes against humanity. The judges’ decision will now allow the prosecution to bring a case.

headline.print_headline: International Court Authorizes Inquiry of Kenyans Linked to 2007 Political Clashes
